subtitle: Private Browsing & Payments Tunnel
privacyDrawerIntro: Privxx helps reduce metadata exposure — such as IP address, location, and timing — when you browse or interact online.

privacySectionDesignedPoint2: make private routing feel simple and familiar
privacySectionNotPoint2: change how you normally browse or use the web
